Packages

Love Is In The Air

The Ultimate Wedding Package!

Ensure those most important moments of your big day are set to the smoothest of tunes.

What's included:

  • Ceremony music: During walking down the aisle and registery signing.
  • Reception drinks: 90mins of our signature set list as your guests enjoy the canapés and reception drinks before the wedding breakfast commences.
  • First Dance: Choose your favourite song to commemorate this intimate moment with your spouse.

From £800
Birthday Bonanza

Let's celebrate life!

This is a perfect choice for those wanting to inject some class to their birthday party.

What's included:

  • Set list: 2 hours of background music for your guests to enjoy while mingling and eating.
  • Happy Birthday: The pivotal moment of event - we will lead the party in singing 'Happy Birthday' to the guest of honor.
  • Request the favourite: Feature a special song for the birthday celebrant that charactirises their taste or personality.

From £400
Happy Hour

The ideal choice for cocktail evening vibes!

Suited for any event requiring elevated atmosphere through quality sonic backdrop.

What's included:

From £550
